title: Topology in Lean Prover
summary: Here we implement some basic topology constructions in Lean Prover 4.

body.raw:
# Implementation and Verification.

The fundamental notion to study in this article is that of a topological space. A topological space is a set $X$ together with a collection of subsets of $X$ called open sets. The collection of open sets is required to satisfy the following two properties:
